amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the SEC to establish a website that provides the public with safety tips for investing in securities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 112-265 to require the Commission to establish a website that provides the public with crowdfunding website safety tips for investing in securities described under section 4(6).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barrow amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Barrow.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Barrow amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
